text:
Saumya Tandon suffers ligament tear while honeymooning in the Swiss Alps Saumya Tandon injured herself while skiing in Switzerland By Urmimala Banerjee | Published: February 4, 2017 12:18 pm Akshay Kumar promotes 'Rowdy Rathore' on the sets of 'Dance India Dance' 
Saumya Tandon of Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hain recently went on a dream holiday to Switzerland. The trip made news because we saw her snaps with husband, Saurabh Devendra Singh. The two have been in a relationship since a long time and tied the knot in a private ceremony last year. This was the first time Saumya made an acknowledgement about her marriage on any social platform. While she had a gala time, it seems the actress suffered an injury due to language issues. 
Well, Saumya and her husband were taking skiing courses in Switzerland. It was a beginner’s course and she was having a lot of fun. But things got awry because of a mix-up in instructions. In a statement to The Times of India, she said, “My instructor spoke very little English while I understood little German. We managed fine during the initial classes as he demonstrated the basic steps. In fact, I had made good progress and both were happy. However, it was in the baby slope that the instructions were lost in translation. I was doing my first solo run and I heard my instructor shout ‘fast’. So, I skied faster, but turns out, he meant the German ‘fast’, which means ‘nearly done’. He was trying to boost my confidence, but I was already skiing at a fast pace and couldn’t control the speed. While trying to stop the slide, I fell with my knees collapsing inwards. I suffered a grade one tear and had a swollen knee.” Ouch! (Also Read: Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hain actress Saumya Tandon FINALLY admits being married, shares honeymoon pictures on social media) 
She is back in town and shooting for her show Bhabhi Ji Ghar Par Hain. While in Switzerland, she had fun in Matterhorn. Saumya also took a cooking course, where she learnt to make Swiss chocolates.
